attributes.action: tTme for possitive changes in the united kingdom.
attributes.additional_details: 1.protect our borders,2,keep our forces intact.3keep all uk citizens safe,put the great back in britton.4 look after the people first,5not to send funding overseas ,6keep funding at home for its own people that need help.7 if one gives respect one will receive respect,8treat all citizens the same as the migrants equality for all,9,send out the message you will only receive what you put in,and not on a plate charity begins at home,10,treat the people as you would like them treat you.11,this is the voice of the people ,and may god bless our queen and its people  amen
